author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-803.  Reduce memory footprint of HDFS namenode by replacing the TreeSet of block locations with an ArrayList.  Contributed by Raghu.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-757.  Fix 'Bad File Descriptor' exception in HDFS client when an output file is closed twice.  Contributed by Raghu.

author: kpvdr
msg: Added .NET generator class to the code generator, and added mechanism to invoke it from the command line. The DotnetGenerator class is still mostly empty (ie has no code generation methods). The next step is to plan the templates that are required for .NET, and then implement them alongside the generator class code snippet methods.
